txt.en: '[placeholder] I am glad you are here. I would request that you travel to Sar-kidul and take the fight to the Orcs. They have grown weak at the camp and now is the time to strike!'
There is no twist in this mission.
You have successfully eliminated Orcs in Sar-kidul. Return with the scout to Ashâmi with this report.
Your mission is to travel to Sar-kidul and take the fight to the Orcs.
'[placeholder], your task is to travel to Sar-kidul and take the fight to the Orcs.'
'I have heard of your victory over Madmurúk and the Orcs in Sar-kidul, [placeholder]. You have done well.'
Your mission is to travel to Sar-kidul and take the fight to the Orcs.\n\nSpeak to Ashâmi to travel.
